entities.name: her
entities.description: The person Harry ended a relationship with. She is referred to as 'her' throughout the conversation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters in the conversation, who has ended a relationship and is now being accused of messing around with someone else.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another main character in the conversation, who is trying to silence Hermione and explain Harry's actions.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A main character in the conversation, who is caught up with Harry and Ron and tries to intervene in their discussion.

relationships.description: Harry ended a relationship with her. This is mentioned by Hermione as the reason for Harry's current behavior.
Harry is now snogging (kissing) her, which is causing problems and hurt feelings. This is mentioned by Ron as a reason for Hermione's concerns.
